subject: June Seminar Schedule
body:
June Seminars
Register 
          today for one of these CPE approved programs, and team up with the leader in electric power 
          and energy education.
















Live 
                                Phone & Web Seminars


 Click Here to Learn More



1.
Introduction to Heat Rates, Spark Spreads, Generation Optionality, Tolling & Heat Rate Linked Power Transactions
                              Two 90 minute sessions – June 21 


2.
Carbon Market Developments 
                              One 105 minute session – June 27  


3.
Fundamentals of the U.S. Electric Service System  - Part I of a two-part series.
                              Two 90 minute sessions – June 27 


4.
Understanding Today's U.S. Electric Power Industry - Part II of a two-part series.
                              Two 90 minute sessions – June 28  


5.
Fundamentals of the Energy & Electric Financial Markets 
                              Two 90 minute sessions   – July 26 
















 In-Depth Classroom Programs



 Click Here to Learn More



1.
Understanding Today's U.S. Electric Power Industry, ISOs & the Basics of   Wholesale Power Transactions June 12, Philadelphia - Crown Plaza City Center


2.
Understanding Today's  Natural Gas & LNG   Industry June 12 & 13, Philadelphia - Crown Plaza City Center


3.
The Fundamentals of Energy and Electric Power Futures, Options   and Derivatives June 13 & 14, Philadelphia - Crown Plaza City Center


4.
The Fundamentals of Gas & Electric Utility Rates June 13 & 14, Philadelphia - Crown Plaza City Center


5.
Introduction to Carbon Market   Trading and Finance  June  14, New York City  - The Torch Club (NYU Campus)
